name: PIC Standard Guard
description: Provenance & Intent Contract verification for OpenClaw tool calls

bridge_timeout_ms.description: HTTP timeout for bridge verification calls (milliseconds)

bridge_url.label: Bridge URL
bridge_url.description: URL of the PIC HTTP bridge (pic-cli serve). Leave blank to use default localhost.

bridge_timeout_ms.label: Timeout (ms)
bridge_timeout_ms.description: Maximum time to wait for bridge response before blocking the tool call (fail-closed).

log_level.label: Log Level
log_level.description: Controls verbosity: debug (all details), info (gate/audit events), warn (errors only).
